content: In fact Dan Abramov himself says so too: “There is so much FUD about local state. “setState is bad”, “no-set-state”, “root of all evil”, “use functional components”. State is fine.”. Also: https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/749712116609871872 EDIT: And of course, I then look down to see who wrote the post I’m commenting on, and it’s facepalm time.
